short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple application for Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple chrome extension for everyone. This extension will work on opening a new tab after installing this extension to your google chrome browser. 

The idea is to simple build and deploy a chrome extension to the market.
